section.title: OFBiz: MFG: Edit production run
section.para: This screen displays the production run. Through this screen you can:

listitem.para: Edit the base details of the production run
View actual cost of the production run - Click 'Actual Costs'

section.title: Base details production run
section.para: This section displays the base details of the production run. Additionally you can edit the details.
In this section following action can be performed:

listitem.para: Cancel - to cancel the production run.
Quick close - to close the production run
Quick complete - to mark the production run as 'complete'
Confirm - to confirm the production run
Schedule -to schedule the production run in the calendar
Print - to create a pdf file of the production run
